about_the_game:
Take to the stars as the commander of the space station Alexandria IV, a place full of danger and strife, be it caused by mercenary aliens or power-hungry corporations. When an ancient secret is revealed on system Groombridge 34, the commander must act with strategy and diplomacy to avoid rupture between factions. In the future, we are not alone.

  • Experience in first hand a new entry of the multi-media spanning series Veil of Truth, by award-winning author J.M. Beraldo.

  • Immerse yourself in a story-rich space opera as the commander of an entire space station. How will you deal with the myriad of problems life in space has to offer?

  • Fall in love with a diverse cast of characters, ranging from fellow humans to the strangest alien species. But beware! Romance between crew members is prohibited and has consequences...

  • Intergalactic trouble never ends: Prove yourself worthy of command by solving conflicts strategically in this five act episodic visual novel inspired by classics such as Deep Space 9 and Babylon 5.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or SteamOS
  • Processor: Multi-core 1.6GHz or faster 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia, AMD or Intel Graphics with support for Vulkan 1.2
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12 Monterey
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Multi-core 1.6GHz or faster 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 11 compatible

short_description: Tasked with commanding of one of the most challenging sectors of the galaxy, the future of the Alexandria IV space station depends on your diplomatic and strategic capabilities. How far will you go to prevent a war? A space opera visual novel by J.M. Beraldo.
